Introducing

the science and art of formulating a mess

Why do we need stakeholders' management?

Because of the complexity of the networked world.

What does stakeholders' management mean?

Guiding the evolution of
a complex system.

How to systemically manage stakeholders?

By combining complexity science with strategic management.

We offer:

Training

Seminars, courses and
customized workshops.

Consulting

Undertaking stakeholders' management tasks in the field.

Experience

A portfolio
of successful projects.

Info sessions

We are organizing two free info-sessions in Brussels.

The team

We are independent professionals with extensive experience in management consulting, policy design, change management, executive coaching, social science research, European project’s management and more. Our combined interdisciplinary expertise allows us to offer a unique, grounded in scientific research and tested in practice methodology of stakeholders’ management - the art and science of formulating a mess. Our offer is based on expertise and pooled resources of our partners.
